name: The Wright Way
description:
*No current sound due to temporary issues*

Follow The Wright Way with quiet, closed off Wilbur and talkative, lucky-to-still-have-some-hair Orville.

They have just failed their flight attempt and must now journey in pursue of their grumpy mechanic, a depressed opera singer's manuscript and the motor parts to an "accidentally" broken projector.

Where puzzles and problems get in the way of smoothly persuading their mechanic to join them, the brothers must go the long way round if they’re to go from crash-landing to flying.
